comment._content: Thanks for your help. We've fixed all of those - and stopped them appearing in Tunisia for good measure.

comment.author: 59375758@N06
comment._content: The caption "Bipson Hills. Nile Tonseu. 1906" is totally wrong!   It actually reads "Ripon Falls. Nile Source.  1906".    It really needs some one conversant with the history and geography of East Africa to go through the captions.
